import { TestCreateStudent } from './TestCreateStudent' import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { fetchUserStudents } from './services/studentServices' import { TestViewStudent } from './TestViewStudent' export const TestModule = ({ user }) => { const [students, setStudents] = useState([]) const [createStudentToggle, setCreateStudentToggle] = useState(false) const [viewStudentToggle, setViewStudentToggle] = useState(false) const handleToggle = () => { setCreateStudentToggle(!createStudentToggle) } const handleFetchCalls = () => { fetchUserStudents(user?.id).then((data) => { setStudents(data) }) } useEffect(() => { handleFetchCalls() }, [user?.id]) // teacher view should be able to view ALL students she creater // parent view should be able to view only the student she syncs with the student code return ( <>

My students

Please click on a name to see your student's information

or add a new student

    {students.map((student) => (

  • {student.firstName} {student.lastName}

    Grade: {student.grade.grade}

    • ))}
{/*
{createStudentToggle ? : null}
*/} ) }
